title: Delhi Capitals Dominate Mumbai Indians in WPL 2024: Lanning & Rodrigues Power Thrilling Win
content:
Delhi Capitals  secured a convincing 29-run victory over Mumbai Indians in the Women's Premier League (WPL) 2024, solidifying their position at the top of the points table. The match was a showcase of power hitting and strategic bowling, with Delhi Capitals setting a formidable target of 192/4. 

Meg Lanning and Jemimah Rodrigues led the charge, both smashing half-centuries, with Rodrigues finishing unbeaten on 69 off just 33 balls. The Mumbai Indians bowlers struggled to contain the onslaught, with Pooja Vastrakar being the most successful with figures of 1/20.

In response, Mumbai Indians faced an uphill battle, despite  Amanjot Kaur's valiant 47. Jess Jonassen, however, proved to be a thorn in their side, picking up 3 crucial wickets, ultimately hindering their chase and securing Delhi Capitals' fourth win of the tournament.
author: Scroll Staff
